description: Financial potential scoring weights based on client priority order

scopeMagnitude.description: How big is the project (scope of work)?

agencyServiceAlignment.description: Percentage of agency services vs non-agency services. Higher percentage brings more revenue.

outputQuantities.description: Listed quantities in scope of work. High quantities indicate higher spend possibility.

outputTypes.description: Types of outputs: video > motion graphics > visuals > content only

holdingGroup.description: Does the client belong to a larger holding group? How large?

entityType.description: Private entity (better budget) vs governmental entity (usually less budget)

mediaSpendData.description: Accessible media/ad spend reports indicating financial readiness to spend

socialMediaPresence.description: Active presence on social media platforms and activity level

contentTypesPublished.description: Types of content client publishes: video (high spend) > images > text (low spend)

low.label: Low Financial Potential - High Risk
low.recommendation: Consider declining or requesting significant upfront payment

moderate.label: Moderate Financial Potential - Proceed with Caution
moderate.recommendation: Acceptable with clear payment terms and milestone-based billing
